alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 3:14PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Otero, central Las Animas and southwestern Bent Counties through 345 PM MDT... At 313 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Rocky Ford to 11 miles south of Timpas to 6 miles southeast of Aguilar. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Damaging winds could extend well ahead of thunderstorms. Locations impacted include... La Junta, North La Junta, Rocky Ford, Las Animas, Swink, Higbee, Model, Hoehne, Timpas, Thatcher, Tyrone and John Martin Reservoir. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM MDT for southeastern Colorado.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Las Animas County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft
